title: Introduction
description: Welcome to ShwupIt! We offer a unique platform for users to swap items effortlessly. By using ShwupIt, you agree to our Terms and Conditions outlined herein. ShwupIt is operated by ShwupIt Private Limited, a company duly incorporated under the Companies Act, with its headquarters in Ireland.

title: User Eligibility
description: To engage in ShwupIt's swapping community, users must be 13 years of age or older. Users under the age of 18 must have consent from a parent or legal guardian to use our services. By participating in our platform, you confirm that you meet these age requirements and have obtained the necessary consent if under 18.

title: Account Use
description: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account and password and for all activities that occur under their account. You agree to notify ShwupIt immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

title: Prohibited Activities
description: ShwupIt prohibits the listing and swapping of illegal items, stolen goods, and items that infringe on intellectual property rights. Users engaging in such activities will face account suspension or termination.

title: Swap Process and Fees
description: Upon agreeing to a swap, both parties are required to deposit an amount equivalent to the value of the items involved. A non-refundable service fee of 5% is applied to each successful swap.

title: Dispute Resolution
description: In the event of a dispute, ShwupIt encourages users to first seek a resolution amongst themselves. If unresolved, ShwupIt reserves the right to mediate and make a final decision based on available evidence.

title: Intellectual Property
description: All content included on ShwupIt, such as text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of ShwupIt or its content suppliers and protected by international copyright laws.

title: Amendment of Terms
description: ShwupIt reserves the right to amend these Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any changes through our platform updates or via email.

title: Governing Law
description: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where ShwupIt Private Limited is registered. Any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that jurisdiction.

title: Contact Information
description: For any inquiries or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please reach out to us via the Contact Us page on our website.
